title: Magnum Ice Cream Falls After Operating Profit Plunges
summary: Magnum Ice Cream Co. shares fell as much as 16% in Amsterdam after the former Unilever Plc unit disappointed investors with a large drop in operating profit last year.

title: BNP Paribas Extends Mistral AI Partnership With 3-Year Deal
summary: BNP Paribas SA is deepening its partnership with Mistral AI, extending it for a three-year period.

title: New CFTC Chairman Michael Selig on How to Regulate Prediction Markets
summary: A new world, where we can bet on almost anything.

title: Czech Central Bank Chief Says Rate Cut Hinges on Core Inflation
summary: The Czech central bank may have “some room” to lower interest rates if it sees easing pressures in core inflation but it will still keep borrowing costs higher than before the coronavirus pandemic, the bank’s governor said.

Currency strategist who incurred Bessent’s wrath exposes safe-haven myth of the dollar
summary: The Deutsche Bank strategist who last month provoked the ire of Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent now says the dollar’s safe-haven status is a myth.

title: SoftBank says it made $4.2 billion from its OpenAI investment in the last quarter
summary: SoftBank, the Japanese tech investor that has aggressively spent pursuing what it calls “artificial super intelligence,” said its recorded a $4.2 billion gain in the last quarter on its 11% stake in OpenAI.

title: One of Europe’s few growth stocks falters on disappointing outlook
summary: Shares of Adyen, one of Europe’s few high-growth tech stocks, slumped on Wednesday after outlining revenue growth that disappointed investors and forecasting steady margins.

title: A 222-year-old U.K. firm to fall into American hands as Nuveen to buy Schroders for $14 billion
summary: A venerable City of London institution is being snapped up by a U.S. asset manager in a nearly $14 billion deal that comes amid growing fears that AI will severely disrupt the finance sector.

title: 20 stocks of companies that delivered a double dose of growth this earnings season
summary: Companies in the S&P 500 achieving double-digit sales growth while improving profit margins include Palantir, Micron, Boeing and Alphabet.
